Posts.Content: Nov 19, 2016 11:54PM Rayven wrote: My initial mammogram was 6 weeks ago and I'm still in the testing phase. I had a neddle biopsy that showed ALH and don't go in for the surgical biopsy for another 3 weeks. The waiting is by far the worst part so far. And, while it seems an eternity, remember they want you off any blood thinning meds, which can include ibuprofen, for 7-10 days, so typically it's at least a week out. I tried to move things up for my needle biopsy and though I wasn't successful it did help my anxieties to try at least.
Posts.Title: Waiting for Biopsy cspence12 Moderators
